replies.msg:
新手Budget $5500-$6000, 打下fifa/2k, 間唔中都會玩下bf1, ow
諗住大概係咁:
i5-7500
B150m or B250m?
1060 6gb
DDR4 8gb ram 2133MHz x 1
450w牛 (antec?)
1tb 3.5" hdd
機箱: 唔係好識
唔知邊間廠好, 有冇建議

同樓主budget同玩既野差唔多
我都係諗住過年換機
問完個friend 佢比左個List我

Intel® Core™ Skylake i5-6500 3.2GHz 6M Cache 4 Core 4 Thread LGA1151 $1452
MSI B250M PRO-VH MATX $620
MSI RADEON™ RX 470 ARMOR OC 4GB GDDR5 $1430
G.SKILL DDR4 Value Series DDR4 2400MHz 8GB (1x8GB) Ram $415 SALES
Antec VPF Series VPF550 80Plus Bronze 550W PSU $490
WD Blue WD10EZEX 1TB 7200rpm 64MB 3.5 Inch HDD $328
ADATA Premier SP550 240GB TLC 2.5 Inch SATA III SSD $525
Sharkoon BW9000-W(Black) 黑色 $490
Total: 5750

佢話u可以上7500 display card 可以轉1060 6GB
但如果呢個budget就頂龍加一舊水轉7500
唔知咁砌會唔會出事

一係就5000用平野，一係比多一千買d靚d

5000過幾年淨係玩到low
